Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/OldDukeSpeaks
Body: Fishermen near the Sulphurous Sea swear the 'Fell Progeny Shinryu' (formerly Old Duke) now speaks in guttural verses. One transcript reads: 'I remember the sky before the Incineration... when Ilmeris still danced.' Marine biologists confirm the beast's vocal cords have mutated, possibly due to prolonged Acid Rain exposure. A cult has formed, interpreting its ramblings as prophecies of 'the Distortion's birth.'
